DescriptionData.Title: Pride Socks - White Rainbow Striped Athletic Ankle Socks
DescriptionData.Description:
Athletic ankle socks are black with a rainbow stripe of red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple in the middle.
The size medium athletic ankle sock should fit Women sizes 5-7, Men sizes 4-6, Made of 56% Olefin, 31% Polyester, 9% Spandex, 4% Nylon and Made in the USA.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: The athletic white rainbow striped socks can be used for any athletic activity or sport. 56% Olefin, 31% Polyester, 9% Spandex, 4% Nylon and made in the USA.

The athletic ankle socks are white with a rainbow stripe of red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple in the middle. The text "PRIDESOCKS" is printed in green on the black on the back of the sock where the achilles tendon is.
Extra Large should fit USA Women sizes 12, USA Men sizes 11-13, EUR sizes 44, UK Women sizes 9.5, and UK Men sizes 10.5-12.5.
Large should fit USA Women sizes 10-11.5, USA Men sizes 9-10.5, EUR sizes 42-43, UK Women sizes 7.5-8.5, and UK Men sizes 8.5-10.
Medium should fit USA Women sizes 5-7, USA Men sizes 4-6, EUR sizes 35-37.5, UK Women sizes 2.5-4.5, and UK Men sizes 3.5-5.5.

VariationData.Color: Green, Blue, Purple, White, Red, Orange, Yellow
